section.p: A Brazier of Hoarding is an organization device that can act as a drop-off point to store items in your Network. Braziers of Hoarding are also a light source.
Any items used on, or dropped on top of, a Brazier of Hoarding will be transported to a Radiant Trove that contains the item.
If no appropriate Radiant Troves exist in your network, items will be placed in Radiant Chests, starting with chests that already contain an instance of the item.
If no storage can be found, items are ejected from the Brazier of Hoarding.
Using a Scepter of Manipulation on a Brazier of Hoarding will toggle whether it is allowed to place items in Radiant Chests that don't already contain a copy of the item.
Braziers of Hoarding can be used as an infusion stabilizer.
Braziers of Hoarding can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
The following blocks are included primarily for decorative purposes.
Blocks of Raw Quartz are a light source.
Blocks of Raw Quartz can be crafted conventionally.
Blocks of Shaped Quartz are a light source.
Blocks of Shaped Quartz can be crafted conventionally.
Radiant Lanterns are a light source.
Radiant Lanterns can be used as an infusion stabilizer.
Radiant Lanterns can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
Raw Quartz Clusters are a light source. They can be collected with a pick bearing the Silk Touch enchantment; otherwise breaking a Raw Quartz Cluster will return a piece of Raw Radiant Quartz.
Raw Quartz Clusters can be used as an infusion stabilizer.
Raw Quartz Clusters are created over time on top of a Radiant Resonator.
Slivers of Light are a light source, and an alternative to torches.

Slivers of Light can be crafted by bashing a piece of Raw Radiant Quartz against another block. Each bash has a 40% chance of creating a single sliver, and a 20% chance of creating a handful of slivers but destroying the piece of Raw Radiant Quartz.
A Gem Cutter's Table is a crafting station used to refine Raw Radiant Quartz into Shaped Radiant Quartz. Items that require finesse to craft are generally made on a Gem Cutter's Table.

Unlike conventional crafting, there are no shape requirements for a Gem Cutter's Table recipe. After selecting the desired item you can simply remove it from the output slot if enough ingredients are present.
Gem Cutter's Tables can be crafted conventionally.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Manifest Lectern acts as a Manifest does, save that it is placed in the world rather than an item you carry with you.
When using the item tracking feature, a Manifest Lectern will draw lines from you to the target inventories, rather than from itself to the target inventories.
Manifest Lecterns can be crafted conventionally.

I remember the awe I felt in my first days as an apprentice at the Eternal University. The soaring, gold-domed towers, perpetual twilit sky abuzz with luminous wisps, the impossibly large spaces contained within far too small buildings.

All of that wonder came crashing down as soon as I attended my first lesson. The master stood above us speaking from a dark wooden podium with golden accents, bellowing to us about responsibility, diligence, and the importance of authority.

His words drained all the wonder from the place. Some of my peers left the University after the speech. Some disregarded his words and were lost. Most, (including myself, to my shame), paid heed to his words and became diligent little cogs in the great research machine.
I know not if he used sorcery to emphasize his lesson to us, or if he was simply an old, self-important blowhard. I often find myself wondering about it when my mind is otherwise unoccupied.

A few years back, the Magistocracy ordered a curriculum review. It was decided that the method of teaching be changed from a master speaking to a great collection of students to a single master and apprentice, eliminating the need for those damned podia. I took one back with me to my Sanctum, and I take great pleasure in consigning it to the fate of a writing desk in some forgotten corner.
A good riddance, I say. To the podia, the old masters, and everything their close-minded reign at the University brought forth.
Personal musings of Sharaveda
...1663, Summer's End
A Monitoring Crystal is a light source.
The contents of inventories with an attached Monitoring Crystal can be seen on a Manifest.
Using a Scepter of Revelation on a Monitoring Crystal will return what direction the Monitoring Crystal is pointing towards.
Monitoring Crystals can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
The Creed of Branding

The promise and distinction you have displayed have earned you the right to call yourself a Master of the Eternal University. As of this moment, you are born anew, free of the shackles of Apprenticeship.
Your forehead shall bear the Brand of Monitoring, and with it we shall watch you. Observation breeds honesty, and honesty breeds Temperance.
Enlightenment is the right of the strong, and no strength can be found in intemperate acts. Trust in the judgment of the Quadrate, and the Magistocracy will trust in your works.
Bask in the light of your Enlightenment, Master, and walk ever on the path of Wisdom.

Radiant Chests are a storage container with as many slots as a vanilla double chest in a single block. Each slot of a Radiant Chest can store up to 256 items instead of the stored item’s normal stack limit.
At the bottom of a Radiant Chest’s interface, you can give it a name to help keep your storage organized. Radiant Chests are also a light source.
Items stored in Radiant Chests appear on a Manifest as long as the Chest's chunk is loaded.
Using a Scepter of Manipulation on a Radiant Chest while holding an item in the other hand allows you to label the chest with the held item. The item is not consumed.
To clear the item, sneak and activate the chest while holding the Scepter of Manipulation with your main hand and nothing in your off hand.
Using a Scepter of Revelation on a Radiant Chest will return the chest's name, and how many slots of its inventory are available.

Radiant Chests can be crafted by using a piece of Raw Radiant Quartz on a chest while sneaking. Any items inside the chest will be imported, and if used on a double vanilla chest, both chests' inventories will be imported into the new Radiant Chest.
Radiant Chests can be crafted conventionally.

Upon further examination, the glowing crystalline substance I was imparted with seems to have spatial (temporal?) distortion properties. Further research is required; I have an idea I wish to test out.

I constructed a frame out of this crystalline substance. Items placed within the frame only seem to be visible—and, indeed, existent, if my instruments are to be believed— from certain angles of view.

I tried to attach wooden panels to the frame to keep the contents within, but they too were subject to this strange spatial distortion. Reinforcing the wood with a lacquer ensorcelled with the Stalwart Oak Abjuration seems to prevent the panels from being affected by these distortions.
It appears my opinions on the usefulness of the Stalwart Oak Abjuration compared to Infused Wood were incorrect. I believe I owe Etrea a drink.
Research Journal of Sharaveda
...1665, Autumn’s Birth
A Radiant Crafting Table acts as a conventional crafting table, except items are not dropped when you leave the interface. Radiant Crafting Tables are also a light source.

After crafting an item, you can click on one of the slots on the right side of the interface to save the recipe. If enough items are present in your inventory, clicking on a slot with a saved recipe crafts the item without requiring you to set items on the crafting grid. Shift clicking clears the recipe in a slot.
Using a Scepter of Revelation on a Radiant Crafting Table will return what items are present in the crafting grid.
Radiant Crafting Tables can be crafted by using a piece of Raw Radiant Quartz on a vanilla crafting table while sneaking.
Radiant Crafting Tables can be crafted conventionally.
...Lore fragment TBD

A Radiant Resonator produces a cluster of Raw Radiant Quartz in the block above itself once every five minutes. Once Quartz is produced, the process halts until the block above the Resonator is cleared.
You can only place up to three Radiant Resonators. Any further Resonators you attempt to place will pop off, and any Resonators placed by automated means will destroy themselves.
Radiant Resonators only run while you’re online, even if the chunk is loaded.
Using a Scepter of Revelation on a Radiant Resonator will return its current process, and whether it is running or not.
Radiant Resonators can be crafted conventionally.
Found in the notes of Sharaveda, Deceased
...Annotation made by Traylin, former Apprentice of the deceased
...1672, Winter's Birth

A Radiant Tank is a storage container that can contain up to 16 buckets of a single type of fluid. Using a Radiant Tank on a fluid inventory will transfer the target's fluid inventory into the held Radiant Tank.
Radiant Amphorae can fill and empty a Radiant Tank from anywhere, as long as the tank is in a loaded chunk.
By using a Containment Field while sneaking, the maximum capacity can be increased by 16 buckets. Up to 9 such upgrades can be applied total.
By using a Devouring Charm while sneaking, fluid added to the Tank in excess of its maximum capacity is destroyed.
Using a Scepter of Revelation on a Radiant Tank will return what type of fluid is stored, its current and maximum capacity, and how many upgrades have been installed.
Using a Scepter of Manipulation on a Radiant Tank will remove one installed upgrade, so long as the storage that upgrade provided is currently unused.
Radiant Tanks can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Radiant Trove is a storage container that can contain up to 64 stacks of a single type of item.
By using a Material Interface while sneaking, the maximum capacity can be increased by 64 stacks. Up to 9 such upgrades can be applied total.
By using a Devouring Charm while sneaking, items added to the Trove in excess of its maximum capacity are destroyed.
Using a Scepter of Revelation on a Radiant Trove will return what type of item is stored, its current and maximum capacity, and how many upgrades have been installed.
Using a Scepter of Manipulation on a Radiant Trove will remove one installed upgrade, so long as the storage that upgrade provided is currently unused.
Radiant Troves can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Containment Field is a crafting component. Containment Fields are generally used in devices that need to keep something confined within an area.
Containment Fields can be used to upgrade Radiant Tanks.
Containment Fields can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Devouring Charm allows you to destroy items or empty fluids out of a bucket. Devouring Charms are also an optional upgrade component.
When used to upgrade a Radiant Tanks, any fluid inserted over the tank's maximum capacity is destroyed.
When used to upgrade a Radiant Trove, any items inserted beyond the Trove's maximum capacity are destroyed.
Placing a Parchtear into the fluid voiding slot of a Devouring Charm restores its charge.
Devouring Charms can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.

The Eternal University makes these simple charms available to all apprentices. Inside the mouth of the charm is a portal similar in many ways to a portal to the Nether, save that the connection is one-way.

Anything inserted into the charm will be gone forever, sent to some hellish void to be destroyed. It is standard University procedure to toss leftover food scraps, experimental waste, creatures you no longer have a need for, and other refuse into your Charm.
Though you have been given a handheld version for personal use, larger charms can be signed out for up to one day’s time with the permission of your Master.

If you find yourself with a case of an exceptionally large mess, a room containing a Devouring Charm approximately eighty blocks in diameter can be signed out with a letter from your Master and the permission of at least two other Masters.
Do show some discretion and at least try not to let anything come to that.
The Apprentice's Panoply
...Form letter given to all Apprentices of the Eternal University
A Gem Socket is a bauble that can be worn in the Body slot.
Activating a Gem Socket allows you to slot in an Arcane Gem. You always treat this gem as if you were holding it for the purposes of passive effects.
The following Arcane Gems have passive effects. Gems with toggles might need to be turned on before inserting before their passive effects take place.
Gem Sockets can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
If another player uses a Letter of Invitation that you crafted, they are added to your Network.
When viewing a Manifest, all placed Radiant Storage from any player in your network is visible.
Letters of Invitation can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
To whom it may concern:

The Omencasters believe that a child with magical inclinations resides in a village called Brightmeadow. On behalf of the Ministry of Recruitment, you are charged to collect this child and bring it to the Eternal University for assessment.

According to their divinations, the child has begun performing magical workings beyond the scope of the hedge magic that the peasantry usually practices. See if you can convince the child to show you its workings. Feign interest, no matter how primitive its spellcraft is.

Your job will be easiest if you can convince the child and its parents to release it to us of their own choosing. Make sure to speak slowly and with simple words. Should the peasantry of Brightmeadow show resistance to giving up the child, offer some small magical enhancements to improve their lives in exchange; perhaps an iron golem or a water purifying charm.

If you cannot convince the village to willingly part, eliminate the child from their memories and take it anyway. Do not worry about resistance or traumatizing it, as its memories will be eliminated and replaced with more convenient ones. This method is to be considered a last resort, the additional work it will incur will significantly damage your standing with the Ministry of Recruitment.
Bask in the light of your Enlightenment, and walk ever on the path of Wisdom.
Official recruitment charge, Ministry of Recruitment
...1647, Winter’s End
A Letter of Resignation can be used to leave a Hybrid Network created with a Letter of Invitation.
When you leave a hybrid network, any Radiant Storage you placed is removed from the network, and will no longer be visible on a Manifest by members of the network you left.
Letters of Resignation can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD

A Manifest lists all items stored within loaded Radiant Storage in one single list. By hovering over a slot, you can get a list of each location that the item is stored at, including names of Radiant Chests. By clicking on the slot, you can track the locations of each of these items, drawing a line from your current position to the target inventories (as long as a target inventory is in the same dimension). Activating a tracked inventory container disables the line, as does hitting the “End Tracking” button at the bottom of the Manifest’s interface.
Items in non-Radiant storage can be added to the Manifest by attaching a Monitoring Crystal to its storage container.
Manifests can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Material Interface is a crafting component. Material Interfaces are generally used in devices that need to read data from a specially prepared Radiant Quartz crystal.
Material Interfaces can be used to upgrade Radiant Troves.
Material Interfaces can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
My tests with the mysterious crystal indicate that each facet, no matter how small or how minutely different from its neighbors, lead to a different part of this strange Otherwhere.
The implications of this property are staggering for compact storage.
Or at least, they would be, if the slightest touch didn’t change what part of Otherwhere the crystal is pointing to. A pity, too. I was rather fond of that spoon.

I believe a device meant to emulate the Unseen Hand of the Master spell, along with some minor divination enchantments for good measure, might have the potential to correct for these instabilities and maintain a consistent location and frequency in Othewhere.
Research Journal of Sharaveda
...1665, Autumn’s Birth
A Matrix Brace is a crafting component. Matrix Braces are generally used in devices that need to hold a piece of Radiant Quartz in midair.
Matrix Braces can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD

A Radiant Amphora acts as a long distance connection to a specific Radiant Tank. You can bind a Radiant Amphora to a Radiant Tank by using the amphora on the desired tank while sneaking. The amphora will become colorized to signify that a connection was made.
While in Fill mode, picking up fluid directly places it into the linked Radiant Tank.
When in Empty mode, fluid is removed from the linked Radiant Tank and placed at the target point.
You can switch the Radiant Amphora's current mode by left clicking the air.
Radiant Amphorae can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
Radiant Dust is a crafting component made from ground up Raw Radiant Quartz. Radiant Dust is generally used in devices where full sized pieces of Radiant Quartz would be too large.
Radiant Dust can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
Raw Radiant Quartz is an unrefined magical crystal that makes up the basis of all of Arcane Archives. It is primarily a crafting component.
Raw Radiant Quartz can be used to convert a chest to a Radiant Chest.
Raw Radiant Quartz can be used to convert a crafting table into a Radiant Crafting Table.
Raw Radiant Quartz can be used to create Slivers of Light by bashing a piece against another block.
Raw Radiant Quartz is created over time on top of a Radiant Resonator in the form of a Raw Quartz Cluster.
...Lore fragment TBD
Shaped Radiant Quartz is cut and polished Radiant Quartz that is suitable for more advanced uses. It is primarily a crafting component.
Shaped Radiant Quartz can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Scepter of Manipulation is used modify properties of certain Arcane Archives blocks. The following blocks have interactions with a Scepter of Manipulation.
Scepters of Manipulation can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Scepter of Revelation is used to query information about specific Arcane Archives blocks if used while sneaking. The following blocks have interactions with a Scepter of Revelation.
Scepters of Revelation are also used as a crafting component for other Scepters.
Scepters of Revelation can be crafted conventionally.

A series of simple divination spells grants this scepter a number of useful information divining abilities. It is standard University procedure to gather data from your experiments using primarily your Scepter of Revelation.

Should your experiments be likely to result in personal injury, your Scepter of Revelation is imbued with a danger-sensing spell and will begin to vibrate wildly. In such a case, you have approximately sixty seconds to vacate the premises.
The Eternal University is not responsible for healing injuries sustained by careless laboratory procedure.
The Apprentice's Panoply
...Form letter given to all Apprentices of the Eternal University

Interesting. The Scepter of Revelation’s ability to divine information appears to be greatly enhanced when the crystalline material (which I have dubbed Radiant Quartz) is attached as a prism of sorts.
Unlike my previous instruments, using this newly improved Scepter of Revelation is returning consistent results from my storage contraption.
Unfortunately, it seems to have lost its precognitive warning capabilities.
Addendum
...Sharaveda
...1665, Summer's Birth
Scintillating Inlay is a crafting component. Scintillating Inlay is generally used in devices that need to transfer signals or perform complex calculations.
Scintillating Inlay can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
...Lore fragment TBD
A Writ of Expulsion can be used to forcibly remove a player from a Hybrid Network.
Once you've named the Writ of Expulsion on an anvil to the name of the desired player to kick from your network, use it to complete the process.
Writs of Expulsion can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
Master Sharaveda, it has become painfully clear that you no longer possess the objectivity necessary to act as a Master of the Eternal University.

You have become utterly obsessed with this material that you claim exists. Yet you have repeatedly failed to produce a shred of actual evidence for its existence, save for glowing fragments. A feat, I might add, that is achievable with a simple cantrip.

It is the opinion of this counsel that your mind has been addled by your thaumaturgical studies. You see things that cannot be because of the Warp that has twisted your mind; you are too taken with your obsessions to understand that existence is based on squares. These five and six sided shapes you speak of are nonsense; the delusions of a sick mind that can no longer cope with reality.

Given your age, it is the opinion of this counsel that your mind is degenerating into senility. These five and six sided shapes you speak of are nonsense; the delusions of a feeble old coot who fails to accept that a theory could be wrong.

A judgment has been reached by a majority of the Quadrate. You have strayed from the path of Wisdom, and your right to Enlightenment is forfeit. You are banished from the Eternal University, and no longer bear the title of Master. You may no longer practice your craft or step foot into the University on pain of execution.
Final statement at Sharaveda’s disciplinary inquest
...Kurst of the Green Flame, Tetrarch of Research
...1670, Spring’s Height
Arcane Gems are specially cut pieces of Radiant Quartz, modified to only glow with a specific color of light. Each gem has unique magical properties.

Most Arcane Gems have an internal reservoir of light, called charge. Once a gem's charge runs out, it becomes dun and cannot be used until recharged. Each gem has a unique method of recharging noted on its individual page.
Please be aware that all Arcane Gem recipes are temporary. Arcane Gems will not be craftable on the Gem Cutter's Table in the future.
The shape of an Arcane Gem is an indicator of the nature of its function.
Gems with an Asscher cut generally affect entities in some way.
Gems with an Oval cut generally affect blocks or items in some way.
Gems with a Pampel cut have strange or difficult to categorize effects.
Gems with a Pendeloque cut generally affect fluids in some way.
Gems with a Trillion cut generally affect energy in some way.
A Slaughtergleam is an Arcane Gem formed from a red-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an asscher cut.
When held, your attacks are considered to have one level of the Looting enchantment. If you are wielding a weapon with the Looting enchantment, its level is increased by one instead.
To recharge a dun Slaughtergleam, activate the gem while you have a gold nugget in your inventory. The gold nugget is consumed.
Murdergleams can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Murdergleam is an Arcane Gem formed from a yellow-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an asscher cut.

When toggled on, a Murdergleam guarantees that all of your attacks will be critical hits. Each attack drains a point of charge (even attacks that deal no damage due to attacking too quickly). The gem can be toggled on or off by left clicking.
When a Murdergleam runs out of charge, it automatically toggles itself off. Likewise, when it reaches full charge, it automatically toggles itself on.
To recharge a dun Murdergleam, land traditional critical hits while the gem is toggled off.
Murdergleams can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
An Agegleam is an Arcane Gem formed from a green-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an asscher cut.
When activated, the amount of time until nearby animals grow up will be significantly reduced, at the cost of charge for each animal affected.
To recharge a dun Agegleam, simply hold onto it. It regains one point of charge every three minutes.
Murdergleams can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Cleansegleam is an Arcane Gem formed from a blue-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an asscher cut.
When activated, a Cleansegleam will purge the user of Hunger, Nausea, and Poison at the cost of a point of charge.
If activated while sneaking, you can attempt to all targets within three blocks of you of these effects instead.

To recharge a dun Cleansegleam, activate the gem while you have a bucket of milk in your inventory. The milk is conusmed, and the bucket is returned. Alternatively, if you have a Radiant Amphora linked to a Radiant Tank containing milk, the milk is deducted from the tank directly.
Cleansegleams can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Switchgleam is an Arcane Gem formed from a purple-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an asscher cut.
When activated, a Switchgleam will swap the positions of you and the entity you're looking at, at the cost of one point of charge.
While held, Endermen within 10 blocks will have their teleportation attempts absorbed.
To recharge a dun Switchgleam, allow it to absorb Enderman teleportation. Each teleport attempt absorbed restores three points of charge.
Salvegleams can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Salvegleam is an Arcane Gem formed from a pink-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an asscher cut.
When held and toggled on, the gem will heal you for half a heart approximately once every second if you are hurt. Each half heart consumes a point of charge.
To recharge a dun Salvegleam, slaughter a passive animal while holding the gem. Doing so restores points of charge equal to half of the animal's maximum health.
Salvegleams can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Munchstone is an Arcane Gem formed from a black-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an oval cut.
When activated, a Munchstone allows you to consume plant-blased blocks to restore your hunger and saturation. Charge is consumed for each point of hunger and each point of saturation recovered.
Notably, you can use a Munchstone even if your stomach is full.

To recharge a dun Munchstone, activate the gem while you have bonemeal in your inventory. Five pieces of bonemeal are necessary to fully refill the gem, and if you have less than five pieces the gem will only be partially recharged. The bonemeal is consumed.
Munchstones can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
An Orderstone is an Arcane Gem formed from a pink-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an oval cut.
When activated, an Orderstone transforms certain blocks into a more orderly state. The following pages list all valid transformations the Orderstone is capable of.
To recharge a dun Orderstone, collect experience globes while holding the gem.
Orderstones can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
The following transformation sequences can be performed:
A Mindspindle is an Arcane Gem formed from a green-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in a pampel cut.

When held, a Mindspindle magnifies the amount of experience contained within experience globes by 50%. It loses one point of charge for each experience point amplified, and can affect an un-amplified total of 800xp before needing to be recharged.

If you come into contact with a very large number of experience globes while holding a Mindspindle, you can absorb their essence instantly, instead of needing to wait for each globe to be picked up in sequence.
To recharge a dun Mindspindle, activate the gem while you have a book in your inventory. The book is consumed.
Mindspindles can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
An Elixirspindle is an Arcane Gem formed from a purple-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in a pampel cut.

When held, you can use potions, splash potions, and lingering potions without consuming them at the cost of one point of charge. Additionally, if you use a potion you do not need to drink it and instead benefit from its effects immediately.

To recharge a dun Elixirspindle, activate the gem while you have nether wart in your inventory. Five pieces of nether wart are necessary to fully refill the gem, and if you have less than five pieces the gem will only be partially recharged. The nether wart is consumed.
Elixirspindles can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Mountaintear is an Arcane Gem formed from an orange-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in a pendeloque cut.
When activated, a Mountaintear will conjure a block of lava at a distance of up to 40 blocks at the cost of one point of charge.

When placed in a Lightwell with access to the sky, a Mountaintear generates lava at a slow rate. While it's possible for a Mountaintear to shatter, the chances of shattering are astronomically unlikely. For all intents and purposes, a Mountaintear lasts indefinitely unless its Lightwell is broken.
Once placed in a Lightwell, a Mountaintear cannot be retrieved.
To recharge a dun Mountaintear, toss it in a block of lava.
Mountaintears can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Rivertear is an Arcane Gem formed from a blue-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in a pendeloque cut.
When activated, a Rivertear will conjure a block of water at a distance of up to 40 blocks at the cost of one point of charge.

When placed in a Lightwell with access to the sky, a Rivertear generates water at an extremely rapid rate. While it's possible for a Rivertear to shatter, the chances of shattering are astronomically unlikely. For all intents and purposes, a Rivertear lasts indefinitely unless its Lightwell is broken. Once placed in a Lightwell, a Rivertear cannot be retrieved.
To recharge a dun Rivertear, toss it in a block of water.
Rivertears can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Parchtear is an Arcane Gem formed from a black-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in an pendeloque cut.
When activated, the Parchtear destroys a radius 1 cuboid area of fluid. If you are sneaking, it instead destroys a single block of fluid. Each fluid block destroyed consumes a point of charge.
To recharge a dun Parchtear, place it in the bucket voiding slot of a Devouring Charm.
Parchtear can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Phoenixway is an Arcane Gem formed from a orange-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in a trillion cut.
When activated, a Phoenixway will light a fire at a distance of up to 40 blocks at the cost of one point of charge.
If you're about to take fire damage while holding a Phoenixway, it will block the damage and grant 30 seconds of Fire Resistance at the cost of twelve points of charge.

To recharge a dun Phoenixway, activate the gem while you have gunpowder in your inventory. Three pieces of gunpowder are necessary to fully refill the gem, and if you have less than three pieces the gem will only be partially recharged. The gunpowder is consumed.
Phoenixways can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.
A Stormway is an Arcane Gem formed from a yellow-spectrum piece of Shaped Radiant Quartz in a trillion cut.
When activated, a Stormway will call down a lightning strike at a point within 30 blocks at the cost of one point of charge.
If you're struck by lightning while holding a Stormway, you gain Speed, Night Vision, and Resistance for a short time. The gem loses six points of charge when it grants these effects.

While toggled on, if you are struck by a projectile attack, a lightning strike is called at the position of your attacker. The bolt is significantly more dangerous than a normal lightning strike, and the gem loses one point of charge to retaliate in this way.
To recharge a dun Stormway, hold or toss it outside during a storm.
Stormways can be crafted on a Gem Cutter's Table.

Every Arcane Archives block you place becomes part of a network. Each block in the network can be accessed by certain items and devices, and ultimately ties back to you. The creation of a network is automatic, and you can only ever belong to one network.

By using a Letter of Invitation given to you by another player, you can form a hybrid network with that player, pooling your resources together. Everything in both players' networks is mutually accessible.
By using a Letter of Resignation, you can break from a hybrid network. All blocks that you placed return to your individual network.
Manifests display the contents of all inventories that are part of the network you belong to.
By using a Writ of Expulsion named on an anvil, you can force a player in a hybrid network to leave the network.
